net.opentsdb.core

类 Const

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.opentsdb.core.Const

  • public final class Const
extends Object
    Constants used in various places.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static Charset ASCII_CHARSET
      The default ASCII character set for encoding tables and qualifiers that don't depend on user input that may be encoded with UTF.
      static boolean CREATE_IF_NEEDED 
      static boolean DONT_CREATE
      Mnemonics for FileSystem.checkDirectory()
      static short FLAG_BITS
      Number of LSBs in time_deltas reserved for flags.
      static short FLAG_FLOAT
      When this bit is set, the value is a floating point value.
      static short FLAGS_MASK
      Mask to select all the FLAG_BITS.
      static byte[] HEX
      Array containing the hexadecimal characters (0 to 9, A to F).
      static short LENGTH_MASK
      Mask to select the size of a value from the qualifier.
      static long MAX_INT_IN_DOUBLE
      Necessary for rate calculations where we may be trying to convert a large Long value to a double.
      static short MAX_TIMESPAN
      Max time delta (in seconds) we can store in a column qualifier.
      static long MILLISECOND_MASK
      Mask to verify a timestamp on 6 bytes in milliseconds
      static byte MS_BYTE_FLAG
      Mask for the millisecond qualifier flag
      static int MS_FLAG
      Flag to set on millisecond qualifier timestamps
      static short MS_FLAG_BITS
      Number of LSBs in time_deltas reserved for flags.
      static byte MS_MIXED_COMPACT
      Flag to determine if a compacted column is a mix of seconds and ms
      static boolean MUST_BE_WRITEABLE 
      static long SECOND_MASK
      Mask to verify a timestamp on 4 bytes in seconds
      static short TIMESTAMP_BYTES
      Number of bytes on which a timestamp is encoded.
      static TimeZone UTC_TZ
      The UTC timezone used for rollup and calendar conversions
      static Charset UTF8_CHARSET
      Used for metrics, tags names and tag values

    • 字段详细资料

      • TIMESTAMP_BYTES

        public static final short TIMESTAMP_BYTES
        Number of bytes on which a timestamp is encoded.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • ASCII_CHARSET

        public static final Charset ASCII_CHARSET
        The default ASCII character set for encoding tables and qualifiers that don't depend on user input that may be encoded with UTF. Charset to use with our server-side row-filter. We use this one because it preserves every possible byte unchanged.

      • UTF8_CHARSET

        public static final Charset UTF8_CHARSET
        Used for metrics, tags names and tag values

      • UTC_TZ

        public static final TimeZone UTC_TZ
        The UTC timezone used for rollup and calendar conversions

        Number of LSBs in time_deltas reserved for flags.

        常量字段值

        Number of LSBs in time_deltas reserved for flags.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • FLAG_FLOAT

        public static final short FLAG_FLOAT
        When this bit is set, the value is a floating point value. Otherwise it's an integer value.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

        常量字段值

      • HEX

        public static final byte[] HEX
        Array containing the hexadecimal characters (0 to 9, A to F). This array is read-only, changing its contents leads to an undefined behavior.

      • MAX_INT_IN_DOUBLE

        public static final long MAX_INT_IN_DOUBLE
        Necessary for rate calculations where we may be trying to convert a large Long value to a double. Doubles can only take integers up to 2^53 before losing precision.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值
